text: Taking a hot bath does not prevent the new coronavirus disease. Normal body temperature remains around 36.5°C to 37°C, regardless of the temperature of your shower. Actually, taking a hot bath with extremely hot water can be harmful, as it can burn you. #CoronaVirusUpdates https://t.co/8j6lXRsDIv
